title: 50 First Dates
description: A man falls in love with a woman who has short-term memory loss, requiring him to win her over every day.

title: A Fish Called Wanda
description: A con artist's scheme to steal a diamond goes awry when she falls for one of her accomplices.

title: Anger Management
description: A businessman is ordered to attend an anger management program after an incident on a flight.

title: Baby's Day Out
description: A baby is kidnapped by criminals but manages to escape and embarks on an adventurous day out.

title: Billy Madison
description: A spoiled man must repeat grades 1-12 to inherit his father's fortune.

title: European Gigolo
description: A charming gigolo's life takes a turn when he falls in love with one of his clients.

title: Happy Gilmore
description: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

title: Hitch
description: A professional dating consultant helps men woo women while facing his own romantic challenges.

title: Home Alone
description: A young boy defends his home from burglars after his family accidentally leaves him behind on vacation.

title: Kicking & Screaming
description: A mild-mannered dad turns into a competitive soccer coach to win against his own father.

title: Kindergarten Cop
description: A tough cop goes undercover as a kindergarten teacher to catch a criminal.

title: Kung Fu Hustle
description: A wannabe gangster aspires to join a notorious gang, only to discover his true kung fu potential.

title: Liar Liar
description: A lawyer who can't tell a lie for 24 hours after his son makes a wish on his birthday.

title: Mr. Deeds
description: A small-town man inherits a fortune and faces city life and corporate scheming.

title: Step Brothers
description: Two grown men become stepbrothers and struggle to get along under one roof.

title: The Animal
description: A man undergoes experimental surgery and gains animal-like abilities.

title: The Naked Gun
description: An inept police detective tries to save the day with hilarious results.

title: The Truman Show
description: A man discovers his entire life is a reality TV show.

title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
description: A middle-aged man tries to lose his virginity with the help of his friends.

title: White Chicks
description: Two FBI agents go undercover as white socialite sisters.
